website_summaries.verdict: Brings the best response out of the antiquated garages with new technology.
pros: Works better than a traditional remote control
We love that we can program multiple users
Should only take a few minutes to install
Helps you modernize and also create timely efficiency with each use
cons: May not be compatible with all garage door openers

customer_reviews.title: Garage door remote on your phone
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as it is described. This basically replaces your car remote by giving your phone the ability to open and closes your door. This is only for a replacment switch, not a totally wireless one. So I have tried it a few times now and it is just as strong of a connection as my garage door remote if not better The installation process was very simple. Got it done in 15 mins. See pictures if you need help.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: This product works really great. It took me about a few minutes to install. Once pair with my cell phone it work instantly. I can operate my garage door opener from across the street. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: decent alternative for remote garage door control
customer_reviews.text: Boy, the installation frustrated me a bunch. The instructions are in broken English and skip several important details and steps. You should really know more than the average Joe about wiring to get this to work. If you follow the first method in the instructions, then you are fine. Follow the second method, and you are screwed. Don't use the connectors wired to the wall switch. Use the connectors to the remote only. Then, it will work. I have a Genie Pro Screw Drive from mid-90s.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Must have for old garage door!
customer_reviews.text: My old garage door opener is acting funky sometime, and would not receive remote control signal based on it's mood! Instead of hiring someone to install a new garage door opener and getting new sets of remote control, I decided to give is little guy a try. I'm so glad I did! Connecting it to the garage door opening is must easier than I thought (10 min.), and I didn't even need my husband's help. It took me a while to pair all the phones, but that's about it, no issue or anything. Even my kids can enter the house from alley now.
customer_reviews.author: Ava C.

customer_reviews.title: Great device but not HomeKit compatible
customer_reviews.text: Good news: Very reasonable price, very fast shipping, everything works and looks good, understandable instructions and easy installation. The app seems to be well built and doesn’t look sketchy like some I’ve seen. Not so good news: This is not Apple HomeKit compatible. The instructions include a way to create a Siri shortcut to operate the control by voice, but it’s neither as seamless nor as reliable as normal HomeKit devices. If you want to use geofencing you have to give the app full time permission to access your location, something I’m loath to do. I recommend this device, but I’m still waiting for the promise of home automation to be mature.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our garage door as regular openers kept failing. Setup was super easy as the instructions that came with it were simple to follow. When we moved the product it stopped working, however, the manual told us what to do for that situation as well. Absolutely no problems and perfect for those of us who don't have the homelink garage button in our cars. I highly recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: It works but read install tips
customer_reviews.text: Put on Overhead Garage Legacy opener. Easy to install. They have an odd app sort of like designed by middle school student for a science project. Get beyond that and make sure to read some of the install advice found here and all will work just fine. I say that because the instructions are not intuitive and the app set up steps are somewhat foreign. Made us happy though as it works with one push of the button vs six or seven tries on the four number remote attached to our home.
customer_reviews.author: MX

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but caution on the app.
customer_reviews.text: So far ok. Installing the sensor was a bit of a challenge in that finding a suitable location was harder than expected. I had to use the adhesive tape and install on the side of the door as the top of the door would have hit the wall sensor. Also, linking to the SmartLife app took a couple tries. As far as the app, well I set a schedule to close at 930pm. Since the door was already closed, the app opened the door instead. I tested again by creating an “open” schedule while the door was open, and it closed the door. Scheduling open or closes is worthless in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself, run away!
customer_reviews.text: The device eventually does work. The app is a complete nightmare. So many passwords and keys. How about one password for each user and just let the admin add users? It took an hour to set this up on 3 phones and rather than put it on my wife's phone when she gets home I'm filing for divorce. It's just not worth the frustration and chest pain that I just went through. I'm giving this one star because I can't go any lower on the rating scale.
customer_reviews.author: William Locke

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile impulse buy
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy to install despite the fact that English was not the first language of the person who wrote the directions. Watch out when you wire this to your opener that you put the black wire on the common post and not the #1 post as the directions say. My opener has the hot and common posts labeled. I wasn't able to link this using the manual process but the actual scan seemed to work. Linking to Alexa was a breeze after adding to the Smart Life app first. I'm at the very edge of my 2G coverage (60' from router) but it still seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Buster E.

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and TAKE MY MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Quit reading reviews and BUY THIS THING! Has an incredible range - and it's SO GREAT to be able to open/close the garage door from your phone! You're not always in your car with a remote that stays in the car, when you need to actuate your garage door - that, and the number of users you can add - for FREE - without having to buy remotes for everyone, is GREAT! It's the greatest thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for me. I love the convenience of being able to use my phone to open the garage especially when going out to walk the dog. No need to remember to grab the one & only remote I have. It took my boyfriend all of 10 min to hook it up & pair it to our phones. He followed the pictures posted for where to connect to the unit. I really needed another remote for the garage door & for the same price I basically now have 5 as this allows for 5 different user profiles. We are currently using on 3 different phones with no issue. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Truly Julie

customer_reviews.title: A bit misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I see now, that my confusion, was by not reading the description carefully enough. It will NOT open you garage door any where but from you home. Just because it uses you cell phone doesn't mean you can open and close your door while away (like I thought). It's on your local WiFi network only. I suppose it still has applications, but not like I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at how well this works and easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and use. Be sure to use the power adapter it comes with or it may not work right. O used a different one while testing it and thought mine was broken. It wasn't. Also, you will likely need to rig something to push the wired end of the sensor away from the wall a little further so it is closer to the magnet. I used a few popsicle sticks. I think others have mentioned they bent some part of it. That may work too.
customer_reviews.author: J Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Doesn't tell you if it's opened/closed though.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and very convenient. The app allows for network connection OR Bluetooth which is nice. The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't tell you if the garage is opened or closed. It would be nice if the unit or app tracked that. It logs each time the button is pressed but no other info is given. Seems like it would be easy to program in a setting where you tell it if it's opened or closed during initial setup and it knows from there.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Burrows

customer_reviews.title: DATONTEN Smart Garage Door Opener Bluetooth Garage Door Remote
customer_reviews.text: This product works right out of the box. Very easy to install. The app goes by name RQ door in the app store. I faced issue with light bulb not operating and contacted support by email, they asked picture of door opener and assured me that it should work, I found loose contact to bulb holder and fixed it. In my case app works even with geolocation is off, which they suggested to keep on and is on normally on any phone. Happy with the functioning. Good part is your cell phone is remote and for backup, any old smartphone with blue tooth 4.00 and above is your backup remote.
customer_reviews.author: pp

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman 315 opener with purple square sync button
customer_reviews.text: This mated up nicely with my craftsman 315 opener with a purple square sync button on the back. Everything went together well and quickly. I highly recommend this opener for the price. I found the best place for my sensor was at the top left of my door, (finding a spot for this to work without interfering with the door operation literally was the most time consuming part of the entire process). Thanks for the great Deal, the unit and app work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This device works!. The app could do a little bit of work but at least it does what it intends to do. You could Open and Close your garage anywhere. Even if you are at work. You could also see the history of who opened and closed your garage and the time. The one I purchased comes with a bluetooth as well. So even if your wifi is down you could still open the garage. 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Erwene Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as advertised, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with this product. It has Wi-Fi connectivity, so you can open/close from anywhere in the world via app. Garage sensor is easy to install. Device installation is easy: I connected the 2 wires to my garage opener button. Take the button off, connect, screw back in. The reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is that the sensor sometimes gets confused whether the door is opened or closed. However overall like the product, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I carpool with my coworker. We take turns driving and meet at my house. On the days when I don't have to drive, I have to carry my garage remote with me to close the garage door. There were many days when I forgot to bring it and had to run back to the house to get it. It's quite frustrating sometimes. Now I have this installed, all I have to do is open the app and close the garage door with a simple touch of the screen. The installation is super easy. Connection is via Bluetooth. This is a small little gadget that makes my life just a bit easier
customer_reviews.author: Nick Tu

customer_reviews.title: If connected correctly, it works
customer_reviews.text: While not very clear on my garage door opener which wires to connect to. I was able to decipher it. Once connected, it worked exactly how it was meant to. Just wish it has the ability to let me know when the door is open. But fr this price point. It a great addition without much work involved to get this so that I can open the garage from my motorcycle instead of needing to get off and open it. Yes I am lazy that way ;)
customer_reviews.author: RemyMartin

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This smart opener has come in handy on numerous occasions. It really works, was fairly easy to set up (my husband did it) I have had to use it because the opener in my car can be fickle at times, so I just pull it up on my phone and it works the first time, every time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Been using this remote more than a week, it's pretty easy to install as long as it woks with your opener, which you can easily find out from description. It takes about 25 mins to install. The APP is simple to use, so you want to buy a garage door remote with wifi function, this is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Serves my need
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my rating to 5 star. I had problems with the first device. It just stopped working after couple of weeks. But I understand there are always few bad parts, that they may not have control over. Their customer service is very prompt. They sent me a new one immediately upon reviewing my first review. I got the replacement and it is working now. So, I will update if that fails too. Pros: Yes, it is as easy as 1-2-3 to install it. The Bluetooth range is really good. Cons: It takes time to connect to Bluetooth and then open the garage door. It is the nature of the device anyway. Nothing against this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: "sreenivs"

customer_reviews.title: Cost the same as a new remote!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER HAPPY WITH THIS! My wife's garage door remote kept burning through batteries. Upon searching the internet for a decent remote, we found that they are about the same price as this bad-ass device. Now both of us can open and close the garage via voice commands with the Bluetooth in our car! You can even rename your garage, for instance, my wife and I are obsessed with Stargate Sg-1 and Atlantis, so we named it "The Iris" so that we get to tell Alexa to open and close the Iris instead. Little things in life.
customer_reviews.author: Pronown

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant idea and I'm so glad I stumbled across it. I had to drill two extra holes in the mounting bracket because of the unusual shape of the mounting surface but that was no big deal. After installing and testing it I unplugged it to reroute and organize the wires and discovered afterwards that it had to be reconnected to the network if it loses power. But overall I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Halfton57

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Bluetooth Remote Technology
customer_reviews.text: Great garage door opener. One device connects to all my family members' phone. Save a lot of my headache for carrying addtional tranditional grage remote or running up and down of my house to get my old remote.. I could finally put my strachty old remote into storage and no need to worry about chaning its battery. The adapter uses bluetooth technology, so i dont need to concern about losing wifi connection as well. The users manual isn't too clear about its installation, but it is not too difficult to me to figure out with my method.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but the app could use some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the app could use some tweaking. Sometimes the app shows the GDO is being used by someone else (which it is not) or it cannot find the controller(even with network connectivity). It would be nice for the app to show an icon of a garage door (with it open or closed) instead of a big blue or red dot/button. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Good When it Connects (keep your garage door opener in your car still)
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection is hit or miss and takes a while to connect sometime. No scan button in-app so you have to close out app and relaunch which takes time. Some time unit requires complete unplug and replug of power to get connection. Have not tried Wifi yet, but imagine the same issues that bluetooth has.
customer_reviews.author: Hobby Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this thing installed in a few minutes. The Bluetooth connection is pretty strong. Although the app might take a few times to get used to, it's still a very good one. I'm glad I bout this product so that now I don't have to fear losing my garage-opening remote. Great product
customer_reviews.author: peijiangao

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around between the big names that offered a door with a smart feature. This one compatible with almost all garage door openers. Works with Google Assistant, Alexa, Siri. This smart garage door opener will not interfere with the existing remotes or wall console. Receive notifications when the garage door opens or closes in real time. And can set up custom notifications so will receive alerts if forget to close the door. Give the families access to activate garage door. And the Activity Log allows to know who accessed the garage for added security.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good signal
customer_reviews.text: This wireless door opener is still great! Very good quality definitely is worth the money. Finally, you don't have to go out with a heavy and troublesome remote control or keys, and you don't have to worry about the distance. You can remotely control from anywhere, it works even out of states. I can feel the convenience and technology that it brings to me. Overall, the installation is not difficult; the setup interface is also very simple. The device itself is very small, can be hidden in the corner of the garage. The signal is very stable, I expected it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ma

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to connect every time
customer_reviews.text: Although this model claims to have wifi wifi capability, it fails to stay connected and is often not usable via wifi. The app is clunky and fails to run in the background to stay connected for quick use via wifi or Bluetooth. It takes time to reconnect every time you go to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worth upgrade with quick install
customer_reviews.text: Installs quick, works great, at ~40 investment its worth the money. Do note that this is Bluetooth only so if you expect one of those remote location status then go for combined one or just wifi one. This one for us serves purpose as you only run app near your garage door and it responds quick enough due to within Bluetooth range proximity. App is little weird but once setup you only open once or twice in a day and just to press that Big blue or grey button.
customer_reviews.author: R Patel

customer_reviews.title: Very clever engineering
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Very cleverly engineered and takes less than 5 minutes to install the main controller. The setting up of the sensors took me another 10/15 minutes. While the app is not the most sophisticated, it is very easy to set up and works. So far extremely happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Arindam Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Product works - so convenient to be able to open the garage door using an app on my phone. Setup was easy - wires were easily identifiable. App found the device right away - added it to my other smart devices...
customer_reviews.author: AC/DC

customer_reviews.title: Seems to have an Issue with My Genie
customer_reviews.text: I went to install the opener and the instructions are not very clear, they show lots of examples of where to connect the wires but don't explain which wires they actually are. I am assuming you are supposed to connect them to the 2 wires that go to the wall button. I have a Genie SilentMax 1000 and it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: komondor

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this one absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: App is unusable on Note 9... pairing becomes lost on multiple phones Lg / Samsung. The last update totally killed this controller. In short dont buy, look elsewhere this in is a waste of time and money. Had to revert to much older app version 1.2.17 just to get it to halfway work.
customer_reviews.author: Queen sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Close twice to close.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and programming. Still, for whatever reason, you have to close the door twice while my other remote control only takes once. It behave like there is an obstruction of the door sensor but pushing the button the second time always worked. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: qpham63

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I find this device really easy to use as compared to the remote control that the garage door comes with. I find myself in situations where my remote control would run out of battery and if have to manually open it (a hassle for a lazy person like me!). Nonetheless, this garage door opener is easy to use and has clear instructions (there's only so many buttons you can press after all) and really easy to install with the instructions that come with it. Overall, great product for a cheap price, I'd definitely would recommend this to other people!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: It really takes me some time but worth
customer_reviews.text: I've been through some difficulty setting up the opener, but it worth the time. Just be careful, the wires should be linked are the left two, and I wrongly linked the first and the last one. After setting up, all operation can be done in one APP. That is so smart and convenient. When I come back home with plenty of staff, I can just call Google to help me close the garage door.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, App NEEDS improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Really easy to install Cons: The app needs a lot of work mainly for Android. Why it needs location services makes no sense. Loses connection to the device frequently. I bought this for my wife to open the garage door in her new car. she has an iPhone so we will see how it works over the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J Soto

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Very convinient
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, all the tools that is required during the installation is included in the package. App is very easy to use, and even supports Siri and shortcuts. Also with the sensor, which I like the most, I’m able to monitor the status of my garage door in case I left it open for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and it works great on my iPhone. I love this because I’d sometimes forget and leave me garage door open. This can close it automatically if you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly !
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly ! Both my wife and I are using with Iphones. Now our Iphones become garage door openers. It is a good item! We need not leave the old garage door opener in our car again. The bluetooth range appears to be about 45'.Well pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not send signal to garage door opener. Does not send the hot spot signal and will not sync.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well & convenience
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy.I use my iPhone and noted the insert in the instructions.It can be install without any instructions. Now I can control the gate to my house.Sometimes I not very sure if I closed the gate or not when I left, but I don't need worry about it after I set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since the door key was invented
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. I can let my kids open the garage door using the app so they can come inside after school. They love to forget their key but we all carry phones everywhere we go. So, the app is their key now. Also, it was a breeze to connect to the opener and very simple to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: App needs work
customer_reviews.text: No Wifi for this model, there is another model that has wifi capability. The app is clunky and fail to run in the background to stay connected for quick use. Takes time to reconnect every time :-(
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it should - robust
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product - so beautiful in its simplicity. I was concerned if it would survive the extreme cold of our winters, so waited to review it until we've had it in use through the worst winter. It does just what it is supposed to do - and while we don't really need the logging feature, I see why that would be great for a museum or business. The Bluetooth range is not quite as big as the range of our stand-alone openers, and I wish the app would try a little longer to find a device, but other than that, it's darn near perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John Lind

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: this garage door opener we already had continued to work without issue. very pleased! instructions are clear. I spent some minutes following the instructions to install. and it works well with my Liftmaster garage door opener. we have four phones paired now, may want to do more in the future. one thing that needs to be noted is that it can't tell you if your door is open or closed. because it works through bluetooth so you have to be within bluetooth range. and the range is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Chen

customer_reviews.title: IOS App Works Better than Android App
customer_reviews.text: Not too expensive, not too difficult to install, and works well -- when it works. On my Android phone (Moto g7), I usually get a "Device not found!" error when trying to connect and need to typically try about 5 times -- sometimes many more. However, a family member's iPhone seems to consistently connect on the first try. So, if you have an iPhone, this might work well for you. Otherwise, perhaps consider the WiFi-connected version (I haven't tried it).
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Good !
customer_reviews.text: My original remote control for the garage was broken and need to buy a replace one. I found this substitute Bluetooth control. I like this because it could be easy to add more user and no need to buy additional control for everyone. It’s very easy to install and setup. I can also easy to monitor who accessed my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I spent plenty of time making sure I had the wires connected correctly, app set up right and the bluetooth remote wouldn't work. It said continually that it was opening the garage door yet it wouldn't work. I even took time to take flip the wires around, uninstall the app and reinstall it. It still doesn't work. I want a refund. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gettelfinger

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after November 2018 update
customer_reviews.text: The developer has not fixed the app. Several app reviews indicate the same problem I am having. The device can not be recognized since the last update on November 18. No response from customer support and no way to get a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade the garage door opener from Boomer to Milleniel effortlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Positive review by a customer using an identical garage door system: the Genie 450, was crucial. This system is over 50 years old and in no way is supported by Genie. I wired it at the switch and it worked perfect after one try! My old system suddenly feels very new and modern.
customer_reviews.author: The Skunk

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: I have purple button, and it is working on my opener. I have been using it around 3 months now, I like the best is to note me that door is open and I can close it from my phone. Best investment in 2020 so far.
customer_reviews.author: windy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, the Bluetooth connection can get a little spotty at times but most times the door opens on queue, I do wish the range was slightly farther you do have to be pretty close to the garage door
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: Don't loose the instructions because they are nowhere to be found online
customer_reviews.text: If you have an android phone, forget it. There is no app for this that I can find. And there is no website that is for this opener. It's like they don't exist.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: Update: Got another one sent to me. Was about to snap because I had the same problem. The problem is not with the unit but with the app. The app was updated. Now you have to have your Bluetooth AND Location on on your phone. Took me a few days to figure it out. Unit works great now. App update sucks though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenica Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection stopped working and asks me to change to wi-fi when I don't want to, because the wi-fi connection outside my garage is too weak.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Does the job & easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: I have a really old garage door opener that doesn’t have digital programming. The hardwired wall button stopped working (I think the wires were old and fried) so rather than installing a new mounted button, I saw this product and it’s perfect! Attached the red and black wires, plugged it in, did the two-step push button sequence to test the device with my opener and voila, it worked perfectly. Downloaded the app and now I’m all set. Would highly recommend for old garage door openers.
customer_reviews.author: Taino

customer_reviews.title: Has all the features you could possibly want and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. The wireless door contact. I searched a lot of these types of openers and they all had similar features. Then I knew all the features I wanted by comparing products. But the it was difficult to find all these features I wanted in one product. Then I found this product had all the features.
customer_reviews.author: OOF123

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately didn't install until after return window. From day 1 connects maybe 20% of the time. Easier to just get out and use key. Takes 3 or 4 tries before it will finally connect. It's a 30 year old opener which works great but remotes are not available. Will be of no help once winter rolls around. Sorry I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Name of App?
customer_reviews.text: I failed to bring along the instructions am attempting to install this on a door out-of-state. Would like to know the name of the iPhone app to complete the installation. thanks in advance.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Customer service for this product has been wonderful. They have answered all my questions with set up and device help quickly and accurately. They have been very accommodating and helpful. I will definitely purchase products through them again. The company replaced my first product as it was not exactly what I wanted without any difficulties. Now it will be perfect. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: A thief’s dream. Easy access for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Security flaw. While using Alexa the device will open the door when you say to close the door without using the pin code. It does not check to see wether the door is open or closed but send an alert with the status once complete. I have an Alexa in my garage and from outside the garage it will open with the close command. Giving anyone that walks up free access to my things. Major flaw
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nartker

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! The previous remote control was broken, so if you switch to this, you can not only remotely control it, but also Bluetooth control even if there is no network, and the old equipment can continue to be used, which is really convenient. No longer have to worry about the battery being dead or the remote control is broken, and worry a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installed it in about 5 minutes, had it working about 2 minutes after that. Wired it to the pushbutton near the door, no problems. Just bought another for the other door. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JPO

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Product is priced right and easy to install. Since I always have my iPhone with me, it is a great backup if my batteries fail on my front door lock or garage door opener. It's much easier than programming and installing a keypad outside the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Martin T

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and easy to use. It integrates perfectly with Alexa and works great, no more wondering if I remembered to close the garage door. This was a great investment, and it is a great product that I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to install and connect. Although the app file size it too big for the little job it does. It works just fine. I hope the app never needs updates. It works fine as is.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-Town DJ

customer_reviews.title: Successfully connected
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to install bluetooth door opener. It opened my eyes because it has easily connected with my iphone. The sensor is sensitive than my expected. What can I ask for more with this price? It makes my home becoming a "smart" home.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my garage door.
customer_reviews.text: Very good update for my garage door. It’s easy to install, just follow the directions. It has been working great for a month. I like the fact that it show on my phone, when the door is up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good price to solve my big problem. It is so convenient to have this. Now I could open the garage door in my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to install and operate. It takes less than a minute to add someone new and not only that but it is also quick without much delay. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Xi Pan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work at all. Each time it was activated it would do a "double click" so it wouldn't open or close the garage door. I promptly returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and works as intended. The wiring was not difficult, but was not as I thought it would be. An email which was quickly responded to clarified everything. Would recommend, and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Knight

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver. Works great. Easy to install and operate. Can open garage from anywhere. Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: danny a. pineda

customer_reviews.title: This will work perfectly if you have a wall switch set of terminals on your head unit.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install. I would take the time and set up the WiFi part before you install the unit to make it easier. Works great with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Shonce

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This works great , I install it as soon as it arrived, pairing was pretty easy and it works great from 300 miles away .
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.text: It works. It took me about 10 minutes to install it, download the app, pair it and start using it. I don’t think you can beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Inverse

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After compare few different products. I Choose this one and I’m so happy to have it. Easy to set up and the app is so simple. Now I don’t need to worry about that I forgot to close my garage door again anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Lu

customer_reviews.title: Overcome weak signal while pairing
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well since install. Helpful hint, if having difficulty pairing, unhook device from opener and place next to router. Device will connect and then you can wire it back to the opener and proceed. Do not let the wire ends touch while pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money and technology.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, it is using bluetooth, which is nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen D. Ly

customer_reviews.title: Would not connect to Pixel 2
customer_reviews.text: Simply would not find the device on a Google Pixel 2. Customer Support was very attentive, but nothing they suggested worked. Unfortunately sent this one back.
customer_reviews.author: NoneOfYourBeesWax

customer_reviews.title: Smartphone garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I do not have to carry around a garage door clicker. This is a must for everyone that has a Smartphone and a automatic garage door opener. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lipsky

customer_reviews.title: Away from home!
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to install and it works great. I can now open my garage for people. And if I forget to close it I can from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Driggers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Works really great. Was easy to install. My wife and myself are satisfied. I didn't have a garage opener when we moved into this house. I didn't want to buy an expensive opener. Now this Datonten smart garage opener solved the problem. Easy to install and affordable. You don't have one get one.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The hardest part of install was getting the door magnet right. Mine is The Bluetooth/ WiFi version.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Junkin

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this device.
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to open and close my garage door from anywhere. And it's great having the notifications when it was left open, I can always close it remotely if I happen to forget. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Budacki

customer_reviews.title: Very Good customer service. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install. First I installed the remote wire in wrong slots on the garage door opener, customer service helped me to fix it and now it works like charm.
customer_reviews.author: Maydavi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it Now if I have my phone I can get in the garage
customer_reviews.author: JAMES PARKER

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and works great had it for a month now and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, it just didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Every wire is where it’s suppose to be. Tried to connect via Bluetooth and internet. Nothing. The garage door is lighting up like it’s trying to work but nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: charli

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install. Solves so many garage door issues. Simple controls. Great range. I’d give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: M. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Gets Sketchy At times. Phone App is hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: App connection gets sketchy at times. Works great at times other times acts like it can't connect. Overall good cheap option.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No network can also use Bluetooth connection!
customer_reviews.text: Can remotely switch the garage door, forget to close the door is not afraid. No network can also use Bluetooth connection!
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a smart home!
customer_reviews.text: Small and relatively simple to install. Door sensor is a little tedious to emplace, but overall pretty good. Especially since a lot of the big name manufacturer devices are sub-par.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says! Easy to install and perfect for me and the multiple people that use the garage. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BD

product_meta.title: Smart Wi-Fi Garage Door Opener Wireless Garage Door Remote, Open and Close Garage Door from Anywhere, Compatible with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant
feature_bullets: Check Compatibility: Compatible with almost all garage door openers. Before ordering please see the User Guide in the Technical Specification below to check if your garage door opener is compatible.
Open&Close Garage Door From Anywhere: Works with Google Assistant, Alexa, Siri. This smart garage door opener will not interfere with your existing remotes or wall console.
Notifications: Receive notifications when your garage door opens or closes in real time. And you can set up custom notifications so you will receive alerts if you forget to close the door.
Multi-User Access: Give your families access to activate your garage door. And the Activity Log allows you to know who accessed your garage for added security.
Quick and Easy Installation: A 2.4Ghz wifi is required. Quick and easy installation. We provides 18-month replacement warranty. Any questions please feel free to contact us.
